    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(java.lang.String ref)
        Creates a static image using the texture that can be referenced in the TextureLoader by ref
        Parameters:
        ref - The reference string to the texture

      • Image

        public Image(AnimationPack animationPack)
        Creates an animated image using the given animation pack
        Parameters:
        animationPack - Animation pack to create the animated image with

      • Image

        public Image(java.lang.String vertexShader,
     java.lang.String fragShader)
        Creates an image that will draw the given shader. Will pass to the shader a "u_time" uniform for shaders that want to change over time, as well as a "u_origin" uniform, and a "u_dimensions" uniform. The given strings must match a shader program in the ShaderLoader.
        Parameters:
        vertexShader - vertex shader name
        fragShader - frag shader name

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(AnimationPack.ImageAnimation newAnimation)
        Sets the current animation. If the new animation doesnt exist in this images AnimationPack, the animation will default to IDLE. If the new animation is the same as the old animation, it will not reset current animation index.
        Parameters:
        newAnimation - The new animation to set
